name: Out of Ctrls
description:
A game made for GMTK's 2020 Game Jam with the theme "Out of control". This is a puzzle game set in a world of various keycaps where you have reach the goal using a limited number of controls. Be careful or you will quickly run out of controls, however you can't hoard them up either.

Sounds and art were not made during the jam, however some modifications were applied.
Music by
    Abstraction - abstractionmusic.com

SFX by

    Kenney - www.kenney.nl
